DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effectiveness ePrime fractional radiofrequency system 1550-nm fractional photothermolysis system ( Fraxel ) ability improve acne scar appearance .
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study Testing Fractional Radiofrequency Versus Fractional Photothermolysis Treatment Acne Scars
DOC.detailed_description: Participants study patient dermatology clinic icepick boxcar acne scar least one 2 x 2 cm area side face . Subjects randomly assign receive fractional radiofrequency treatment either right leave side face contralateral side receive 1550-nm fractional photothermolysis . Subjects receive treatment baseline , week 4 , week 8 total three treatment . Follow visit take place week 16 , two month follow last treatment visit . This study pilot study design determine feasibility procedure .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects age 18 year old . 2 . Subjects bilateral 2x2 cm area ice pick and/or boxcar acne scar face . 3 . Subjects good health . 4 . Subjects willingness ability understand provide inform consent communicate investigator . 1 . Subjects receive injectable softtissue augmentation material face , facial ablative resurfacing , within past 6 month . 2 . Subjects receive injectable botulinum toxin face , nonablative laser treatment face , within past 3 month . 3 . Subjects local infection , open facial wound , significant local skin disease would interfere acne scar treatment energy device . 4 . Subjects allergic lidocaine prilocaine . 5 . Subjects history abnormal scarring treatment area , keloid scar formation . 6 . Subjects ectropion eyelid disfigurement . 7 . Subjects history isotretinoin use precede year . 8 . Pregnant lactating individual .
